name: roblinux
short_description:
EN - Linux distribution that focus at "only command line administration", only for servers. It supports kernel virtual machines, LSB compliant. For expert administrators who like the Slackware model (we support Slackware with money when possible).
IT - Distribuzione Linux mirata alla "only command line administration", solo per server. Supporta le kernel virtual machines, LSB compliant. Per amministratori esperti cui piace lo Slackware model (vorremmo supportare la Slackware economicamente, quando sara' possibile).
